snippet: Andy Murray heads into the French Open buoyed by his form on clay, especially after handing top-ranked Novak Djokovic a stinging defeat recently....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray heads into the French Open buoyed by his form on clay, especially after handing top-ranked Novak Djokovic a stinging defeat recently.

headline.print_headline: Andy Murray Heads Into French Open in Confident Form on Clay
headline.main: Andy Murray Heads Into French Open in Confident Form on Clay
